availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Daviess County and Ballard County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Physician in Daviess County in 1860. Physician in Ballard County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County,District 1, p. 418B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Owensboro, District 4, p. 145.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky Ballard County, District 2, p. 33.
Records of the Internal Revenue Service. Record Group 58, Series M768, Roll 3. The National Archives at Washington, DC. Access via Ancestry.
Find A Grave, "William B. Duncan (1816-1882)," Memorial #38434649, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/38434649 (accessed March 28, 2018).
